name: Yew Spirit
originalText: {2}{G}{G}: Yew Spirit gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is its power.

rulings.text: The value of X is determined when the ability resolves. The bonus won’t change later in the turn if the creature’s power changes.
If this creature’s power is negative as its ability resolves, X is considered to be 0. (This is a change from previous rulings.)

text: {2}{G}{G}: Yew Spirit gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is its power.
